meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the February 1, 2024 and February 15, 2024 City Plan Commission hearings.

agenda_items.title: Development Plan Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned South Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 582.

agenda_items.title: Development Plan Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Subareas A and B within Planned Development No. 778.

agenda_items.title: Minor Amendment Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a minor amendment to an existing development plan on property zoned Planned Development District No. 166.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2365 for the sale of alcoholic beverages.

agenda_items.title: Authorized Hearing - Zoning Cases
agenda_items.description: A City Plan Commission authorized hearing to determine the appropriate zoning for the area.

agenda_items.title: Authorization of a Hearing
agenda_items.description: Consideration of authorizing a public hearing to determine the proper zoning on property zoned various districts.
